long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Easily generate summaries for YouTube videos with a single click. This extension extracts the video's transcript and uses AI to provide a concise summary directly in your browser. Simply click the "Generate Summary" button to get a quick overview of the video's content.

Note: For this extension to work, you need to be on YouTube video pages with URLs in the format https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=*.
